TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ScrollBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control
Public MustInherit Class ScrollBar Inherits Control
public ref class ScrollBar abstract : System::Windows::Forms::Control

summary.span: 实现滚动条控件的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality of a scroll bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你通常不会继承直接从类。You typically do not inherit directly from the class. 若要创建你自己的滚动条类，从或类。To create your own scroll bar class, inherit from the or class. > [!NOTE] > 滚动框有时称为滚动块。The scroll box is sometimes referred to as the scroll thumb. 若要调整滚动条控件的值范围，设置和属性。To adjust the value range of the scroll bar control, set the and properties. 若要调整滚动框移动的距离，设置和属性。To adjust the distance the scroll box moves, set the and properties. 若要调整滚动框的起始点，设置属性最初显示控件时。To adjust the starting point of the scroll box, set the property when the control is initially displayed. 用户界面指南建议和属性设置相对于该用户将看到，不适用于包括不可见的部分的总大小的视图大小。User interface guidelines suggest that the and properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part. 例如，如果你有一个图片框带滚动条显示大图像，和属性应设置相对图片框的大小，而不图像的大小。For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the and properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并初始化和将其添加到。The following example creates and initializes a and adds it to a . [!code-cpp[Classic VScrollBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic VScrollBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic VScrollBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic VScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic VScrollBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic VScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: 一个 值的按位组合，指示如何定义由 返回的控件大小和位置。

A specifying the scaled bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个帮助器方法使用方法以返回应通过缩放控件的边界。This is a helper method that used by the method to return the bounds that the control should be scaled by. 如果你希望重复使用，你可以重写此方法缩放逻辑，但你需要提供您自己的边界。You may override this method if you wish to reuse scaling logic, but you need to supply your own bounds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int LargeChange { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，当滚动框长距离移动时向 属性加上该值或从中减去该值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a large distance.
A numeric value.
The default value is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击中的滚动框中，任何一侧的滚动条轨道根据中设置的值的属性更改属性。When the user clicks in the scroll bar track on either side of the scroll box, the property changes according to the value set in the property. > [!NOTE] > 可以处理按键事件，以便当用户按 PAGE UP 或 PAGE DOWN 键滚动框移动。You can handle key press events so that when the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key the scroll box moves. 用户界面指南建议和属性设置相对于该用户将看到，不适用于包括不可见的部分的总大小的视图大小。User interface guidelines suggest that the and properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part. 例如，如果你有一个图片框带滚动条显示大图像，和属性应设置相对图片框的大小，而不图像的大小。For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the and properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image. ## Examples 下面的示例假定你已创建了、 添加到，并添加了一个水平和垂直到。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此示例中，属性设置相对于的大小。In this example, the property is set relative to the size of the . 你必须添加对引用和要运行此示例的命名空间。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Maximum { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可滚动范围的上限值。

span.span: Gets or sets the upper limit of values of the scrollable range.
A numeric value.
The default value is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可能考虑调整属性动态以匹配的滚动条的父与成比例像素大小或数量的行或显示的行的大小。You might consider adjusting the property dynamically to match the size of the scroll bar's parent in proportion to pixel size or to the number of rows or lines displayed. 仅可以以编程方式达到最大值。The maximum value can only be reached programmatically. 滚动条的值无法访问通过在运行时的用户交互其最大值。The value of a scroll bar cannot reach its maximum value through user interaction at run time. 可以通过用户交互达到的最大值等于 1 加上属性值减去属性值。The maximum value that can be reached through user interaction is equal to 1 plus the property value minus the property value. 如果有必要，你可以设置属性的对象为-1 到帐户 1 的术语的大小。If necessary, you can set the property to the size of the object -1 to account for the term of 1. ## Examples 下面的示例假定你已创建了、 添加到，并添加了一个水平和垂直到。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此示例中，属性设置为的大小plus 滚动条是否可见的大小调整因子大小属性。In this example, the property is set to the size of the plus the size of the scrollbar if it is visible plus an adjustment factor of the size of the property. 你必须添加对引用和要运行此示例的命名空间。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 引发 事件

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将转换鼠标滚轮移动滚动时处于活动状态。The control will convert mouse wheel movements to scrolling when the is in focus. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnScroll(class System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs se) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnScroll (se As ScrollEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类。The following code example uses the derived class . 事件处理程序和创建事件。Event handlers for the and events are created. 此代码假定和已在窗体上创建和按钮有一个事件处理程序事件。This code assumes that a and have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the event. 单击该按钮，在代码中调整的滚动条的属性。When the button is clicked, the property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code. 该标签将显示的当前值属性并更改它的事件。The label will display the current value of the property and the event that changed it. 您将注意到，当滚动值更改按钮的仅事件引发事件。You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's event, only the event is raised. 与此相反，滚动条滚动时手动后立即引发事件事件。In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the event is raised immediately after the event. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类。The following code example uses the derived class . 事件处理程序和创建事件。Event handlers for the and events are created. 此代码假定和已在窗体上创建和按钮有一个事件处理程序事件。This code assumes that a and have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the event. 单击该按钮，在代码中调整的滚动条的属性。When the button is clicked, the property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code. 该标签将显示的当前值属性并更改它的事件。The label will display the current value of the property and the event that changed it. 您将注意到，当滚动值更改按钮的仅事件引发事件。You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's event, only the event is raised. 与此相反，滚动条滚动时手动后立即引发事件事件。In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the event is raised immediately after the event. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)). [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Paint As PaintEventHandler

summary.span: 在重绘控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is redrawn.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Scroll As ScrollEventHandler

summary.span: 在通过鼠标或键盘操作移动滚动框后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the scroll box has been moved by either a mouse or keyboard action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例滚动图片框的图像。The following example scrolls an image in a picture box. 它使用滚动条重绘新映像的一部分，只要用户进行滚动。It uses the of the scrollbar to redraw a new part of the image whenever the user scrolls. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例使用派生的类。The following code example uses the derived class . 事件处理程序和创建事件。Event handlers for the and events are created. 此代码假定和已在窗体上创建和按钮有一个事件处理程序事件。This code assumes that a and have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the event. 单击该按钮，在代码中调整的滚动条的属性。When the button is clicked, the property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code. 该标签将显示的当前值属性并更改它的事件。The label will display the current value of the property and the event that changed it. 您将注意到，当滚动值更改按钮的仅事件引发事件。You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's event, only the event is raised. 与此相反，滚动条滚动时手动后立即引发事件事件。In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the event is raised immediately after the event. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SmallChange { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置小距离移动滚动框时，在 属性中加上或减去的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a small distance.
A numeric value.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按某个箭头键或单击滚动条按钮时，之一根据中设置的值的属性更改属性。When the user presses one of the arrow keys or clicks one of the scroll bar buttons, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 用户界面指南建议和属性设置相对于该用户将看到，不适用于包括不可见的部分的总大小的视图大小。User interface guidelines suggest that the and properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part. 例如，如果你有一个图片框带滚动条显示大图像，和属性应设置相对图片框的大小，而不图像的大小。For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the and properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image. ## Examples 下面的示例假定你已创建了、 添加到，并添加了一个水平和垂直到。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此示例中，属性设置相对于的大小。In this example, the property is set relative to the size of the . 你必须添加对引用和要运行此示例的命名空间。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TabStop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户能否使用 Tab 键将焦点放到 控件上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to the control by using the TAB key.

value.span: 如果用户可以用 Tab 键将焦点放到该控件上，则为 ；否则为 false。

span.span: if the user can give the focus to the control by using the TAB key; otherwise, false.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 TAB 键时，则会将输入的焦点设置为下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order. 控制与属性值`false`不包括在 tab 键顺序中的控件集合。Controls with the property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order. 你可以通过设置控件的操作的 tab 键顺序属性值。You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's property value.

summary.span: 获取或设置表示滚动框在滚动条控件中的当前位置的数值。

span.span: Gets or sets a numeric value that represents the current position of the scroll box on the scroll bar control.

The default value is 0.
